label: Calibration options
description: Options for calibrating to Spectrum outputs. If national Spectrum file, 'National' and 'Subnational' options will return the same result. Some calibrations will invalidate model inference to survey, ART programme, and ANC testing data. If calibration adjustments are large, it is recommended to review Spectrum results and Naomi input data rather than accept large calibration adjustments.

controls.name: spectrum_population_calibration
controls.helpText: Calibrate to Spectrum population size by sex and 5-year age group by national or subnational. If national Spectrum file, national and subnational will return the same result.

controls.name: spectrum_plhiv_calibration_level
controls.label: Level
controls.helpText: Calibrate to Spectrum mean total PLHIV.

controls.name: spectrum_plhiv_calibration_strat
controls.label: Stratification
controls.helpText: Calibrate to Spectrum mean total PLHIV.

controlGroups.label: Adjust to Spectrum number on ART

controls.name: spectrum_artnum_calibration_level
controls.label: Level
controls.helpText: Calibrate to Spectrum mean total on ART.

controls.name: spectrum_artnum_calibration_strat
controls.label: Stratification
controls.helpText: Calibrate to Spectrum mean total number on ART.

label: Output options
description: Options for controlling downloaded model results

controls.name: max_iterations
controls.helpText: Maximum number of iteration for model run

controls.name: no_of_samples
controls.helpText: Number of simulatons for generating uncertainty ranges

controls.name: rng_seed
controls.helpText: Random number generator seed for uncertainty sample

controls.name: permissive
controls.helpText: Select 'Yes' to allow fits with convergence or data errors.

controlGroups.label: Logit prior mean for neighboring district attraction.

controls.name: artattend_log_gamma_offset
controls.helpText: Logit offset for odds of obtaining ART in district j compared to home district.
